title: Video: Alt-J – Tessellate
content:
Following the rise and rise of Alt-J has been a hugely rewarding process.

From appearing on the scene under two years ago, to the release of their critically acclaimed debut LP An Awesome Wave earlier this year, their meteoric climb to mainstream success is well underway. Having had forthcoming single Tessellate Radio 1 A listed yesterday, the Leeds four piece have released the accompanying video for the track. Apparently a “twist on Italian Renaissance painter Raphael’s ‘The School of Athens’, set in a modern day gangster’s paradise” it’s slightly bizarre video, directed by Alex Southam. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
